Name: Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX
About the game: 'Get ready for the apeX of 2D action!' Lock-on shots, wall jumping, hovering, air-dashing. Use every tool at your disposal to soar through levels and crush the bosses that await you. Acquire 'EX Weapons' from defeated bosses to expand your arsenal! Experience high-speed, stylish action like never before. Inti Creates presents the ultimate in classic 2D action with 'Luminous Avenger iX'!
